author: dildick
body: In the past we had ME3/1 and ME4/1 OTMBs with RPC digis. I scrapped those a while ago, since RPC digis will not be sent to the local trigger. An OTMB class for ME3/1 and ME4/1 without RPCs was constructed. Those OTMBs are based on the ME1/1 OTMB for high-pileup running, but they are a lot simpler because (1) the wiregroups are not slanted and (2) the chambers are not divided into two readout sectors for halfstrips.
title: ME3/1 ME4/1 Phase-2 upgrade TMB
